amendment.description: Page 34, strike line 13, and insert the following: "(x) Payment to Existing Loan Servicers-***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-21 to require a servicer that receives an incentive payment under the Hope for Homeowners program to notify all mortgagors under mortgages they service who are "at-risk homeowners", that they may be eligible for the HOPE for Homeowners Program and how to obtain information regarding the program.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Titus amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Titus.
